line_1: Strike the soft, sweet, harmonic chord,
line_2: And on the heart feel every word

line_1: With me salute the Teian chord,
This heart is thine, and every faithful chord
line_2: Will only vibrate to thy well known word:

line_1: While plaintive accents swell the softest chord,
line_2: And breathe full harmony on every word;
